Start: ^Its a rather sunny morning, and I decide to head into the art room to do some painting, or what have you.
^I'm rather suprised to see Eduardo is here by his lonesome this early in the day.
^He's got a bowl of cereal in his hand, siting on the floor and eating.

c: ^] "I guess not. Just weird is all."

g-0: ^] "I am rather suprised to see you here though. I didn't take you for a morning person."
^"My sleep schedule has been all over the place lately."

b: ^"That all nighter we pulled the other day really put it in a twist."
^"I slept most of the day, and today I got up before the sun."
^"Me and Isaac stayed up all night the other day, so it kinda threw everything off."
^"Crap, was it even yesterday, or two days ago? What day is it, anyways?"
^[Eduardo] "Okay then yeah, it was yesterday. Or, I guess it started Tuesday night?"
^Still, spending the entire night hanging out with someone sounds nice. Wish I had known about that. I might have stopped by for a while.
^Yeah, I didn't feel like going. Wonder if there was anything else?
^So that's where Eduardo and Isaac were late Tuesday night/Wednesday morning.
^I'll have to keep a note of that for next week.

g-0: ^[Eduardo] "Anyways, I kinda just felt like coming in here this morning. Not sure why really. To admire the view of the garden?"
^"Or maybe this place just reminds me of Isaac."
^"I really do love him, you know."
^Oh dear, Eduardo appears to be having a gushing fit over his boyfriend.
^And I have no easy way out of listening to his gushing now.
^"I want to be around him all the time, and he wants to be around me all the time."

c: ^I decide not to challenge his view on his own relationship.

Gushing: ^I just sort of sit there listening to Eduardo gush and gush about his relationship with Isaac.
^His excessive passion is very inspiring and my skills in <color=color_expression>expression</color> increase considerably, but it <color=color_wellbeing_penalty>significantly tires you out</color>.
^When I check the clock, I realize three hours have passed.
^Luckily Isaac eventually walks in to save me from the gushing.
^] "Oh, nothing. Eduardo's just been talking my ear off about how much he loves you."
^I use this as the perfect opertunity to leave.
^I slip away without saying goodbye, as Eduardo gushes at a stunned and embaressed Isaac.

b: ^[Eduardo] "That's a funny joke. Anyways, where was I?"
^Eduardo isn't listening. He seems far too wrapped up in his passion. I guess I was not expressive enough to get through to him.
^] "Your relationship with Isaac is far from perfect."
^He notices the serious tone of your voice.

Disbelief: ^Sensing the awkwardness and your failure to convince Eduardo of anything, you silently leave the room.
Contention: ^You confront Eduardo on the true shakeyness of his relationship.
